Title: Blue's Clues
Writer: Angela Santomero, Traci Paige Johnson, Todd Kessler
Actors: Aleisha Allen, Cheryl Blayloc, Christiana Anbri, Cody Ross Pitts, Donovan Patton, Jonathan Press, Julia Wetherell, Kathryn Avery, Kelly Nigh, Patrick Van Wagenen, Sean Hanley, Spencer Kayden, Stephen Schmidt, Steve Burns, Thomas Sharkey, Traci Paige Johnson
Plot: Blue's Clues is a show where the two main characters are Blue and Steve (1996-2001), or in later episodes, Joe(2001- ). Blue is a dog who always wants to do something but Steve never knows what. Steve interacts with the viewers through the television and they play Blue's clues, to see what Blue wants to do.
